title: 用钻石砍树无效。。
author: phpsyser
txt_content:
- essentials.build 有给这权限 能破坏草不能砍树啊 一键砍树插件也无效 是GM配置有问题？

 Builder:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - bossshop.open
    - chestcommadn.open.vip.yml
    - chestcommands.command.open
    - chestcommands.open.CD.yml
    - chestcommands.open.cjch.yml
    - chestcommands.open.mrlb.yml
    - chestcommands.open.vip.yml
    - essentials.build
    - essentials.kits.mrlb
    - essentials.warp
    - -essentials.chat.color
    - -essentials.me
    - -essentials.powertool
    - -essentials.seen
    - marry.default
    - MyPet.command.capturehelper
    - MyPet.command.info.other
    - MyPet.command.name
    - MyPet.command.name.color
    - MyPet.command.release
    - MyPet.command.respawn
    - MyPet.command.switch
    - MyPet.leash.chicken
    - MyPet.leash.Pig
    - MyPet.leash.Sheep
    - plotme.limit.1
    - plotme.use
    - plotme.use.add
    - plotme.use.remove
    - quickshop.create.buy
    - quickshop.create.sell
    - quickshop.use
    - scriptblock.interact.use
    - scriptblock.walk.use
    - vipzero.usekey
    - vipzero.viptime
    - RandomPlacer.use
    - coreprotect.inspect
    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&f[&6&l玩家&f]'
      suffix: ''



   info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&f[&6&l玩家&f]'
      suffix: ''


这个 info:
      build: true 是什么意思

replies.author: 秋凛Rinco
replies.txt_content: 可以尝试重置ESS插件，具体原因如果只是一种斧头无效，可能是砍树插件的问题，辅助可以去原贴升级或者看看配置，
